About.title: Discover more about
About.experience-1: Graduated in System Analysis and Development and postgraduate in Machine Learning
About.experience-2: TI work as a full stack developer specialized in Vivo (Telefônica) B2C channels, leading the development of solutions for user interfaces and back-end integrations. I work with React and Next.js on the front-end and with NestJS on the back-end, in addition to implementing storage and caching solutions using MongoDB and Redis, creating scalable and high-performance solutions. To ensure code reliability and quality, I create unit tests with Jest in the Node ecosystem, using Stryker to identify and eliminate mutants and improve test coverage. I perform component tests with Cypress and Cucumber, ensuring the functionality and robustness of the interfaces. I have experience with Docker and Kubernetes for container management and application orchestration, and we use Azure as a cloud computing platform to optimize the performance and scalability of services
About.experience-3: I worked as a software developer for Vivo (Telefônica) in B2B channels. Orchestrated technical refinements under client demands, creating quality development architectures at Meu Vivo Empresas. I developed demands using different technologies, such as: Vue.js, Node.js, Java Quarkus, Python. I created covering quality, unit tests with Jest in the demands of the Node ecosystem, in addition to eliminating mutants with Stryker. Unit testing in Java with JUnit. I performed numerous site reliability engineering (SRE) activities at Meu Vivo Empresas, monitoring and solving common problems in large software. Working in microservices using Kubernetes, Docker and RabbitMQ for messaging. Architected improvements in communication between microservices, proposing solutions that added maturity to the business. Proposed and developed architectures that covered the use of MongoDB for document manipulation and caching with Redis. Technologies such as: Grafana, Kibana, Prometheus and Dynatrace to monitor, improve and promote the maturity of software and its respective microservices
About.experience-4: Development stage. HTML, CSS, JS (React) where I participated in the development of a system for calculating medication dosages in the neonatal ward, in collaboration with Compass.uol, the University of Santa Cruz do Sul and the Hospital de Santa Cruz do Sul. I used HTML, CSS and JavaScript (React) on the front-end, developing an intuitive and responsive interface for users, and I worked on integrating business logic in the back-end, which was developed with Spring Boot
About.experience-5: I worked as a freelance web application developer for advertising companies, focusing on complete end-to-end projects. I used technologies like Laravel to build robust back-ends, while on the front-end I developed intuitive and dynamic interfaces
